transact.caution03: You need to order at least {no} USDT.
transact.caution04: Invalid TP/SL. Please enter a valid value.
transact.caution05: Reducing leverage is not supported in Isolated Margin Mode with open positions.

positions.sent04: Take-Profit must be higher than the current price ({num} USDT) for Long positions.
positions.sent05: Stop-Loss must be lower than the current price ({num} USDT) for Long positions.
positions.sent06: Take-Profit must be lower than the current price ({num} USDT) for Short positions.
positions.sent07: Stop-Loss must be higher than the current price ({num} USDT) for Short positions.
positions.sent08: Stop-Loss must be higher than the liquidation price of {num} USDT for Long positions.
positions.sent09: Stop-Loss must be lower than the liquidation price of {num} USDT for Short positions.
positions.sent10: Your order has been successfully filled.

openOrders.cancel1: Are you sure to cancel all?
openOrders.cancel2: Are you sure to cancel all Limit orders?
openOrders.cancel3: Are you sure to cancel all Stop-Limit orders?

account.startMsg: Are you ready to begin demo trading?
account.resetMsg: Do you really want to reset your investments?
account.resetCaution: You can only reset if your balance is {num} USDT or less.

liqprice.fieldMsg: Please fill in all the required fields.
liqprice.caution01: Your open positions will be taken into consideration when calculating the liquidation price. Unrealized PNL and maintenance margin of your open position  will affect the calculation of liquidation price.
liqprice.caution02: There may be a difference between the estimated and actual liquidation price.
liqprice.caution03: See what the potential risk and reward will be in monetary terms on any given trade. Use our Futures Calculator to establish your potential profit/loss on a future trade.
